name: telhan-sathi-chain
description: Distributed Blockchain for SIH Agri-Market Linkage

scripts.node1: set NODE_ID=node1&& set PORT=3000&& set P2P_PORT=6001&& set ENABLE_DISTRIBUTED=true&& node app.js
scripts.node2: set NODE_ID=node2&& set PORT=3001&& set P2P_PORT=6002&& set ENABLE_DISTRIBUTED=true&& set "BOOTSTRAP_NODES=ws://localhost:6001,node1"&& node app.js
scripts.node3: set NODE_ID=node3&& set PORT=3002&& set P2P_PORT=6003&& set ENABLE_DISTRIBUTED=true&& set "BOOTSTRAP_NODES=ws://localhost:6001,node1"&& node app.js
